My son worked for Sendiks all through high school & college. During the school vacations & every summer he worked full time & even got a Christmas bonus. He loved working for them & was treated well. Maybe not offering full time work to someone is a way of getting rid of employees who aren't working out well. He was pd $8.00 an hr, which was way over minimum wage then.
